member.name: T:Ucommerce.SystemHttp.Pipelines.Initialize.ReinitializeWebApiControllerCache
member.summary: Poke the WebAPI internal cache to get it to re-read the controllers.
member.remarks:
WebAPI initializes its internal cache of available controllers in a "PreApplicationStartMethod". Ucommerce loads all the assemblies found in the "Apps" folder in a "PreApplicationStartMethod".
This introduces a race condition, since the order of execution of "PreApplicationStartMethod" cannot be controlled.
So in order for any custom WebAPI controllers found in assemblies in "Apps" to be picked up by WebAPI, we need a little magic to get it to re-initialize its internal list, at a point where we know the additional assemblies have been loaded.

member.name: M:Ucommerce.SystemHttp.Pipelines.Initialize.ReinitializeWebApiControllerCache.Execute(Ucommerce.Pipelines.Initialization.InitializeArgs)
member.summary: Find the internal controller caches, using reflection, and "persuade" them to re-initialize.
